name: Camp VR (Ebony Edward)
description:
In Camp VR you play as a scout and must overcome challenges and trials in order to collect badges and earn high scores.

The camp has a selection of three badge-worthy activities; the Archery range, Wood Chopping and Rock Climbing, You can also explore a hub world that is the intersection of those three mini games where you can get your VR legs.

Install instructions

This game requires a VR headset and controllers to play.

Simply extract the .zip file and run the camp vr executable fi.e.
